headline: Kagro in the Morning podcast (AUDIO): Thursday, January 13, 2022
author: Scott Anderson
sentences: As a us regular KITM listeners already know well, there isnt much us regular KITM listeners dont already know, because David Waldman has already covered it for us on earlier KITMs, therefore its difficult getting a handle on whats common knowledge in the rest of the world.
There isnt a grocery shortage out there starving Americans, however a COVID testing site shortage has been a boon for the corrupt and incompetent.

Listen to our archived episodes: RadioPublic|LibSyn|YouTube
Support the show: Patreon|PayPal: 1x or monthly|Square Cash
*
Youre spoiled.
David explains it all in intricate detail, so that us regular KITM listeners will again be puzzled on how others just cant keep up.
Herschel Walker, who wants to be a Senator, believes there exists a secret mist that kills any COVID on your body.
The bar for GQP overreach might have actually been reached in the state where the Governors son runs the court.
We all know who signed forged electoral documents sent to the National Archives  because they signed them.
Glenn probably thought he had "natural immunity" from catching it the first time.
Of course, democracy was saved yesterday, but that doesnt mean its out of danger.
For instance, there is this thing going around called COVID, and its bad stuff.
Did you know that the Ohio Supreme Court might have just saved democracy?
Dewormer, dirt, Viagra, pee, are all bad substitutes for vaccines.
There are even vaccines that prevent COVID or mitigate symptoms.
Chuck Schumer has a very short time to rescue us and has a plan.
Matt Gaetz is begging to go to jail, perhaps someday he shall.
If so, wouldnt MAGA be lining up for the treatment?
Will they be prosecuted for felonies?
Oh well, live and learn... or don't.
Glenn Beck now has caught it twice.
You wouldnt want to catch it.
Who knows?
